							 Our Customers Reviews Peter Souris Transformers CC I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for setting us up with your Advisor Boikanyo Maselwa. He is an exemplar person and representative and comes highly recommended by me.

He is very precise, efficient and able to terminate "waffling" efficiently. I really enjoyed working with him on this issue we had. He is exceptionally well versed in Labour Law and I will definitely be requesting his assistance and advise in future. Tomco We had the SEIFSA training  on Diversity and Inclusion at our premises. I really want to compliment your trainer Zizile who presented the class with an absolute passion. It was very inter-active and all of us have benefited tremendously from this. Please give her a compliment from all of us at Tomco and keep up the good work. Winder Controls We would like to extend a warm thank you for organizing an amazing training session at our offices in Bedfordview. Not only was the session very informative but the training material provided was most useful. Macsteel Partnering & building a relationship with the RMA team enhanced the effectiveness of the end-to-end IOD claims process. Innovation and initiatives introduced by RMA year on year, is a clear indication of their commitment to continually improve processes, customer relations and experience.

 Macsteel Komatsu Mining Corp. Group Eleen, thank you so much for the training on Contract Price Adjustment. Your training was truly informative, particularity because you utilized relevant examples the team is familiar with.

Your insights and exposure to best practice was beneficial to my team. You demonstrated that you are a subject matter expect.

We will surely take you up on your offer of picking your brain every now and then!

  M-TEC Thandeka, thank you for being an excellent trainer today. It was a very informative, helpful and enjoyable session. You clearly answered our questions and gave us more information to take into account.We’ll encourage more for our customers to subscribe to SEIFSA.Thank you once again Arnot Power Station - Generation I attended the CPA training on the 20th August 2024 in Boksburg. It was a very effective training as it was an interactive class where you were able to answer our questions and providing scenarios to assist us in understanding better. you were also very professional, friendly and very easy to approach. I would recommend the training to those who want to use the indices and to understand how to use them and how they impact their contracts. Astec Industries As a newly appointed and trained Employment Equity Committee member, I would like to thank Astec Industries Africa Middle East for entrusting me with this role and responsibility. The informative content received through the Steel and Engineering Industries Federation of Southern Africa (SEIFSA) workshop will certainly be put to good use. ACTOM (Pty) Ltd I would like to congratulate the SEIFSA team on an exceptionally well organised event and for raising the profile of our industry. I am honoured to be affiliated with this institution, which has moved in leaps and bounds, under the new leadership. Bright Spark Electrical & Industrial Excellent Service from Thandeka Shabangu
 "We at Bright Spark Electrical are grateful for the outstanding support provided by Thandeka Shabangu. As new members, she patiently guided us through SEIFSA's processes, making everything clear and manageable. Thanks to her assistance, we are now signing up for training and subscribing to SEIFSA. Her professionalism and dedication are truly commendable." OREA HOLDINGS Pyt Ltd We would like to recommend Ms Thandeka Shabangu for the Contract Price Adjustment Training, The facilitator was able to give us the information that we were expecting and with confidence, basically she was good. NTCSA The Contract Price Adjustment training, facilitated by Eleen, provided valuable insights into the implications of CPA in NTCSA’s long-term procurement contracts. It was an enlightening session that equipped buyers in Procurement & Supply Chain Management with essential knowledge for drafting fair contracts. Thanks to SEIFSA for the informative session.
